nodes.text: Sanctuary was a location in the Outer Rim Territories that was a safe world of the nascent Alliance to Restore the Republic. A map of the galaxy with a legend listing the various Alliance safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, rebel operations sectors and regional headquarters, and shadow planets with deep space caches, included Sanctuary.
Sanctuary was first mentioned and pictured in canon in the 2017 reference book and boxed set by Daniel Wallace, Star Wars: The Rebel Files.
